ma_token_code_id.description: maToken code id used to instantiate new tokens

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>

Decimal256.description: A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal256(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0 The greatest possible value that can be represented is 115792089237316195423570985008687907853269984665640564039457.584007913129639935 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
